text: Carl Fredrik Reutersw채rd (4 June 1934 - 3 May 2016) was a Swedish painter and sculptor. He was a professor of painting at The Academy of Fine Arts in Stockholm from 1965 until 1969. In 1974, he was a guest professor at Minneapolis School of Art in Minneapolis, Minnesota. In 1986 he was awarded the Prince Eugen Medal for painting. Reutersw채rd was known for his sculpture showing a revolver tied in a knot, called Non violence. It is outside of the United Nations Headquarters in New York City. Reutersw채rd died of pneumonia at a hospital in Landskrona, Sweden on 3 May 2016, aged 81. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Swedish painters Category:Sculptors Category:20th-century painters Category:21st-century painters
